{"id":943069905,"question_id":583,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1683010316,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/943069905/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"43.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        \n        int m = word1.length();\n        int n = word2.length();\n        \n        int[][] dp = new int[m+1][n+1];\n        for(int[] d : dp)\n            Arrays.fill(d, Integer.MAX_VALUE/2);\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<=m; i++) //當word2是空字串。所有dp[i]都要刪(op) i個字串才會相等\n            dp[i][0] = i;\n        \n        for(int j=0; j<=n; j++)\n            dp[0][j] = j;\n         \n        for(int i=1; i<=m; i++){\n            \n            for(int j=1; j<=n; j++){\n                \n                if(word1.charAt(i-1) == word2.charAt(j-1))\n                    dp[i][j] = Math.min(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][j-1]);\n                \n                dp[i][j] = Math.min(dp[i][j], dp[i-1][j]+1);\n                dp[i][j] = Math.min(dp[i][j], dp[i][j-1]+1);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
